name: Digital Gold Tycoon
description:
*THIS GAME MIGHT BE HARD TO UNDERSTAND AT FIRST, BUT IF YOU TAKE YOUR TIME TO LEARN IT CAN BE REALLY FUN*

Try to buy when the values gets low all of the Crypto have diffrent spans of value, and you need to figure out the time to buy and when to sell.

Please let me know if you find any bugs.

if you can't see all the buttons correctly try making it fullscreen with the blue bottom under the game window on the right side.

It's a idle crypto currency game i made in about a month with a little bit of help from my friend, my plan is to keep giving it updates and add prestige, for right now the play time until it gets just plain boring i would say is about 30-60 minutes, but i hope you can enjoy this casual little idle.
